aboutText.title: About me, who am I and what do I do?
aboutText.text1: I am JavaScript Full Stack developer. I am currently live in Honduras, but I am interested in traveling to other countries.
aboutText.text2: I am an organized person, very collaborative and orderly. I like challenges and working on projects both large and small. I am very oriented to working on open source platforms such as servers and at the level of programming languages and databases.
aboutText.text3: Finally, I am a family man and I have 2 princesses, my wife is an independent accountant and together we make a great team because she has her clients and generally I provide them with services such as websites, cloud server management, email management and domain .

skillsText.title: Skills and Knowledge
skillsText.text1: My specialty has been directly in web development with the MERN (Mongo-Express-React-Node) stack, but I have also managed Linux servers (Ubuntu, RedHat, Debian, CentOS).
skillsText.text2: I am very interested in developing with open source technologies with JavaScript, and I would like to learn about Android application development with ReactNative.

contactText.title: Contact Me
contactText.name: Full Name
contactText.subject: Subject
contactText.validName: Must be more than 5 and less than 30 characters
contactText.sentMessage2: I will contact you as soon as possible.
